description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

Journeybread contains a mix of fruits, nuts, and grains with an alchemical boost. Eating one journeybread provides all the food and water you need for a day. If you subsist on nothing else for a week, you become temporarily immune to journeybread until you eat real food and drink water normally for 24 hours.

In addition to the benefits of journeybread, power journeybread grants you a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{Force Open}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, and to Fortitude saving throws against being sickened. The number of minutes you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{Hustle} changes to your Constitution modifier Ã— 20. These benefits last for 4 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.LIhJbq72TiDu5kGs]{Effect: Journeybread (Power)}
